item.description:
We are meeting in East Cambridge Sunday Dec 13th 3PM to 6PM to collaborate, arrange, rehearse and record member's songs. This effort will also progress towards playing out at open Mikes and making a CD, for those interested. Eventually we will have comprehensive shows with everyone at a local Cambridge Clubs.

Bring your songs & ideas, and if you are new think of the 3 major goals you would like you accomplish in this group, so that can be incorporated in the agenda matrix. If you have songs, try to bring copies - chord charts & lyrics.

The official meetup time is 3 to 6PM, but if you can't make it for most of that, the extended time is from around 2PM until 7 PM, I'll give the address later to "yes" attendees and "maybes", and my email to verify extended time hours.
item.how_to_find_us: I will give exact address to attendees & maybes

group.name: The NEW England Singer Songwriter Musician Guild

item.name: MEETUP # 3 Song Rehearsal, Jam, for Open Mikes & Recording
